repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

msContents.summary:
This is a multiple text manuscript which contains one text which is a lexicon which enlists words with variations in the forms. There are two different texts of the same title one is written by Puruṣottamadeva who is a grammarian and a lexicographer. This manuscript states that the author of the text is Śrīharṣa. The text consists of verses.
Extent: title folio, 32-51 [dvirūpakoṣa], 52-71 [liṅganirṇaya], 72-110 [dhātupāṭha],3 blank folios. Dhātupāṭha has some marginal intertitles. 1 stringhole 95 mm from left edge .
The text of Dhātupāṭha as here mentioned in the manuscript that is written by Kṛṣṇadāsa, is not exactly found in the New Catalogus Catalogorum. The page numbers of Dhātupāṭha manuscripts from the New Catalogus Catalogorum referenced here are from the category unspecified. It is possible that the author information is missing, in which case they must be checked.

msItem.title: Dvirūpakoṣa
msItem.author: Śrīharṣa

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum Vol 9: p.209, Hamburg 35-3326.

msItem.incipit: 32v 1phrabodhamādhātumaśābdikānāṃ krp̥ āmavāptuñca satāṃ kavīnāṃ . dvirūpakośo racito 32v 2 vicāryya bahuprabandhasthitaśabdabhedān jñātvā ca pūrvapracuraprayogān pramāṇikodāharaṇani 32v 3 matvā rūpadabhedeṣvabhilakṣyateṣu vilakṣaṇāt sancinuyāṃ suśabdāt
msItem.explicit: 51v 1 ṣadhamahākāvyojvalat kīrtitā upātta prativādimastadīvityastavāmāṃghriṇāṃ śrīharṣeṇa krt̥o dvirūpa51v 2 vilasat kośassatām śreyase ௳

msItem.title: Liṅganirṇayabhuṣaṇa
msItem.author: Rāmasuri
msItem.incipit: 52v vāṇīm praṇamya śirasā bālānaṃ jñānasiddhaye stripuṃnapuṃsakaṃ svalpaṃ vakṣyate śāstraniścitaṃ 52v 2 topuriviṣṇuviduṣā sununā rāmasuriṇā viracyate budhaśrāvyaṃ liṅganirṇayabhuṣaṇaṃ athādau 52v 3 tāvat striliṅgā ucyante
msItem.explicit: 71v 1 sakaṃ kriyāvyaya? viśeṣaṇānāṃ karmaikatvaṃ napuṃsakatvañca vaktavyaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣaliṅgaṃ vaktavyaṃ .
msItem.finalRubric: 71v 2 iti liṅganirṇaye napuṃsakaliṅgāssamāptāḥ .. liṅganirṇayabhuṣaṇaṃ rāmasuriṇāviracitaṃ 71v 3 saṃpūrṇaṃ …. …… śubhamastu

msItem.title: Dhātupāṭhaḥ
msItem.author: Kṛṣṇadāsa
msItem.incipit: 72v 1 vaiyākaraṇasiddhāntakaumudyuktaprakārataḥ . kṛṣṇadāsena kṛtinā dhātupāṭhaḥ pralikhyate . 72v 2 bhūsattāyāṃ . udāttaḥ . parasmaibhāṣā … aidha vṛddhau spardhasaṃgharṣe gādhṛpratiṣṭhālipsayorthe
msItem.explicit: 110v 3 śabdo gṛhyante maṅgalārthaḥ . iti curādayaḥ tatprayojako hetuśca hetumati ca iti ṇyantaprakriyā . 110v 4 iti ṇijvikaraṇaḥ . iti daśavikaraṇī likhitā . tatra prathamaśśap dvitīyoluk tṛtīyaḥ śluḥ caturthaśyan pañca 110v 5 maśnuḥ ṣaṣṭhaśśaḥ saptamaśnam aṣṭamaḥ nu navamaḥ śnā daśamo ṇic .

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin.
supportDesc.condition: F. 46 broken on left edge. Good state of preservation.

additions.desc: dvirūpakoṣa is written in the left margin on 32v.
liṅganirṇayaḥ is written in the left margin on 52v.
Dhātupāṭhaḥ is written in the left margin on the verso of the folio.
śrīrstu is written in the left margin on 72v with the title Dhātupāṭhaḥ.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.
